data.name: View100_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 请面对ZKOO让它识别您的脸。
data.comment: Please face ZKOO and let it detect your face.

data.name: View100_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: ZKOO不能识别您的脸，请把您的脸和上身置于相机视图的中央
data.comment: ZKOO cannot detect your face. Make sure your face & upper body are positioned in the center of the Camera View.

data.name: View100_Message00300_TextKey
data.value: 当不能显示相机视图时，请查看一下安装指南，确认ZKOO是否安装好了。
data.comment: If you do not see the Camera View, refer to the Setup Guide on how to set up your ZKOO.

data.name: View100_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 请让ZKOO识别您的手。
data.comment: Move your hand inside the Gesture Tracking Area.

data.name: View100_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 在脸的左右将显示两个方框，这是手势跟踪区域。
data.comment: You will see 2 rectangular outlines appear next to your face. This represents the Gesture Tracking Areas.

data.name: View100_Message00600_TextKey
data.value: 在手势跟踪区域内，找到一个手可以放松的状态并举起手。
data.comment: Move your hand inside the Gesture Tracking Area. Make sure your arms are in a comfortable, relaxed position.

data.name: View100_Message00700_TextKey
data.value: 请将手指稍微分开，像擦玻璃一样，左右水平地稍微挥挥手。
data.comment: Open your hand and spread your fingers. Slightly wave your hand.

data.name: View100_Message00800_TextKey
data.value: 请将您的手移出手势跟踪区域以结束手势的操作。
data.comment: Now, move your hand out of the Gesture Tracking Area to end the gesture control.

data.name: View101_Message00000_TextKey
data.value: 开始练习吧。
data.comment: Let's practice.

data.name: View101_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 做得好！
data.comment: Well done.

data.name: View101_Message00215_TextKey
data.value: 请在1分钟内练习5次
data.comment: Let's try this 5 more times. You have 1 minute.

data.name: View101_Message00225_TextKey
data.value: 请在2分钟内练习5次
data.comment: Let's try this 5 more times. You have 2 minute.

data.name: View101_Message00600_TextKey
data.value: 请开始。
data.comment: Go ahead.

data.name: View101_Message00201_TextKey
data.value: 还有1次。
data.comment: One more time.

data.name: View101_Message00202_TextKey
data.value: 还有2次。
data.comment: Two more times.

data.name: View101_Message00203_TextKey
data.value: 还有3次。
data.comment: Three more times.

data.name: View101_Message00204_TextKey
data.value: 还有4次。
data.comment: Four more times.

data.name: View101_Message00300_TextKey
data.value: 时间到了。再练习一次吧。
data.comment: Time's up. Please try again.

data.name: View101_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 做得好！练习下一个吧。
data.comment: Well done. Let's practice something else.

data.name: View001_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 开始练习把手势跟踪光标显示在屏幕上。
data.comment: Let's practice displaying the Gesture Cursor on the screen.

data.name: View001_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: 请坐在ZKOO的前面，确保您的脸和上身都能显示在相机视图的中央。
data.comment: Sit in front of the ZKOO and ensure both your face & upper body are positioned in the center of the Camera View.

data.name: View001_Message00300_TextKey
data.value: ZKOO已经识别您的脸。
data.comment: ZKOO has detected your face.

data.name: View001_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 用鼠标或手势点击“视频”按钮可以重放教程视频。
data.comment: Click on the "Video" button by using a mouse or gesture to replay the Tutorial Video.

data.name: View001_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 用鼠标或手势点击"练习"按钮可以重做这个练习。
data.comment: Click on the "Practice" button by using a mouse or gesture to retry this practice.

data.name: View001_Message00600_TextKey
data.value: 用鼠标或手势点击"下一个"按钮可以跳过这个练习。
data.comment: Click on the "Next" button by using a mouse or gesture to skip this practice.

data.name: View001_Message00900_TextKey
data.value: ZKOO已识别您的手，开始跟踪您的手了。
data.comment: ZKOO has detected your hand and is now tracking it.

data.name: View001_Message01000_TextKey
data.value: ZKOO识别您的手之后，手势跟踪区域的形状就变了。
data.comment: After ZKOO detects your hand, the shape of the Gesture Tracking Area changes.

data.name: View001_Message01100_TextKey
data.value: 一个指示标显示在手心。
data.comment: A Pointer is shown at the center of your palm.

data.name: View001_Message01200_TextKey
data.value: 手势光标显示在屏幕。
data.comment: You should now see the Gesture Cursor on the screen.

data.name: View001_Message01300_TextKey
data.value: 要想不再显示手势光标，请将手移出手势跟踪区域。
data.comment: To stop displaying the cursor, slide your hand out of the Gesture Tracking Area.

data.name: View001_Message01400_TextKey
data.value: ZKOO已经停止跟踪您的手。
data.comment: ZKOO has stopped tracking your hand.

data.name: View001_Message01500_TextKey
data.value: 开始练习让ZKOO识别您的手并显示手势光标。
data.comment: Let's practice letting ZKOO detect your hand to bring up the Gesture Cursor.

data.name: View001_Message01600_TextKey
data.value: 请在1分钟以内把显示光标然后再不显示光标练习5次。
data.comment: Try showing and hiding the Cursor 5 times. You have 1 minute.

data.name: View002_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 开始单手练习移动手势光标。
data.comment: Let’s practice moving the Gesture Cursor.

data.name: View002_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: 移动您的手，手势光标将随着移动。
data.comment: When you move your hand, the Gesture Cursor moves along with it.

data.name: View002_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 请将光标按顺序移动到①，②，③，最后到④。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circles 1, 2, 3, and 4 in this order.

data.name: View002_Message00501_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到①。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circle number 1.

data.name: View002_Message00502_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到②。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circle number 2.

data.name: View002_Message00503_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到③。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circle number 3.

data.name: View002_Message00504_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到④。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circle number 4.

data.name: View002_Message00700_TextKey
data.value: 熟练之后，即使不看相机视图，也可以很容易的操作手势光标。
data.comment: Once you get the hang of it, you should be able to easily control the Gesture Cursor without relying on the Camera View.

data.name: View003_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 开始单手练习点击手势。
data.comment: Let’s practice the tap gesture.

data.name: View003_Message01100_TextKey
data.value: 请按顺序点击①，②，③，④各三次。
data.comment: Please tap on circles 1, 2, 3 & 4 in that order. Repeat 3 times.

data.name: View003_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到①。
data.comment: Move the Gesture Cursor to circle number 1.

data.name: View003_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 开始练习点击吧。
data.comment: Let's practice tapping.

data.name: View003_Message00700_TextKey
data.value: 开始点击，1次，2次，3次。
data.comment: Let's begin. 1, 2, 3.

data.name: View003_Message01201_TextKey
data.value: 请移动光标到①并点击它三次。
data.comment: Move the Cursor to circle number 1 and tap it 3 times.

data.name: View003_Message00300_TextKey
data.value: 保持大拇指横向伸出，轻轻地弯曲其他四指然后快速地松开。
data.comment: While keeping your thumb sticking out to the side, curl your 4 fingers toward your palm then quickly uncurl.

data.name: View003_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 在声音告知计数到3之前，您需要弯曲然后再松开四指。
data.comment: A voice will count to 3. Within that time, you will need to curl and quickly uncurl your fingers.

data.name: View003_Message00800_TextKey
data.value: 再次练习点击。
data.comment: Again. 1, 2, 3.

data.name: View003_Message00900_TextKey
data.value: 如果手指长时间弯曲或没有伸展到直立状态的话，ZKOO识别为长按。
data.comment: When you leave your fingers curled for a while, ZKOO detects it as a long press.

data.name: View003_Message01000_TextKey
data.value: 请快速地弯曲然后松开手指成直立状态来实现点击。
data.comment: In order to tap, make sure you immediately uncurl your 4 fingers after the initial curl.

data.name: View003_Message01202_TextKey
data.value: 请点击②三次。
data.comment: Tap circle number 2 three times.

data.name: View003_Message01203_TextKey
data.value: 请点击③三次。
data.comment: Tap circle number 3 three times.

data.name: View003_Message01204_TextKey
data.value: 请点击④三次。
data.comment: Tap circle number 4 three times.

data.name: View004_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 开始单手练习拖动手势。
data.comment: Let’s practice the drag gesture.

data.name: View004_Message00900_TextKey
data.value: 请抓住①的小圆并依次拖到②，③，④上，到了目的地后伸直四指放下小圆。
data.comment: Grab the small circle inside area 1 and drag it to areas 2, 3, 4 in that order.

data.name: View004_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: 请把手势光标移动到①的小圆上。
data.comment: Move the Gesture Cursor to the small circle in the upper-right corner of the screen.

data.name: View004_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 保持大拇指横向伸出，轻轻地弯曲其他四指。
data.comment: Remember to keep your thumb sticking out while curling your other fingers.

data.name: View004_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 保持手指弯曲状态，将①的蓝色小圆移动到②上。
data.comment: While keeping your fingers curled, move your hand to drag the small circle inside of the bigger circle on the bottom right of the screen.

data.name: View004_Message00700_TextKey
data.value: 小圆被移动到目的地了，就可以松开手了。
data.comment: After moving the circle to the target area, please open your fingers.

data.name: View004_Message00800_TextKey
data.value: 您的拖动操作成功了。
data.comment: You have now successfully dragged an object.

data.name: View004_Message01100_TextKey
data.value: 请将手势光标移到小圆的上面。
data.comment: Move the Gesture Cursor on top of the small circle.

data.name: View004_Message01200_TextKey
data.value: 弯曲您的四指来抓住小圆。 弯曲四指抓住小圆。
data.comment: Curl your 4 fingers to grab the small circle.

data.name: View004_Message01000_TextKey
data.value: 抓住①处的小圆并拖到②处。 弯曲四指抓住①的小圆拖到②上后，伸直四指。
data.comment: Grab the small circle inside area 1 and drag it to area 2.

data.name: View004_Message02102_TextKey
data.value: 保持四指弯曲拖动到②上后伸直。
data.comment: Keep your fingers curled and drag it to area 2.

data.name: View004_Message02103_TextKey
data.value: 保持四指弯曲拖动到③上后伸直。
data.comment: Keep your fingers curled and drag it to area 3.

data.name: View004_Message02104_TextKey
data.value: 保持四指弯曲拖动到④上后伸直。
data.comment: Keep your fingers curled and drag it to area 4.

data.name: View004_Message02202_TextKey
data.value: 继续拖动到②上后，伸直四指。
data.comment: Continue to move it to area 2.

data.name: View004_Message02203_TextKey
data.value: 继续拖动到③上后，伸直四指。
data.comment: Continue to move it to area 3.

data.name: View004_Message02204_TextKey
data.value: 继续拖动到④上后，伸直四指。
data.comment: Continue to move it to area 4.

data.name: View004_Message00600_TextKey
data.value: 不需要大幅度地移动您的手。
data.comment: There is no need to make large movements with your hand.

data.name: View004_Message01600_TextKey
data.value: 在拖动时请保持四指弯曲，到了目的地，请伸直四指放下小圆。
data.comment: When dragging, keep your fingers curled with your thumb sticking out to the side.

data.name: View004_Message01700_TextKey
data.value: 请按顺序放下。
data.comment: Drop them in order.

data.name: View005_Message00100_TextKey
data.value: 开始单手练习滑动手势。
data.comment: Let’s practice the flick gesture.

data.name: View005_Message00200_TextKey
data.value: 请用滑动手势，滚动方框中显示的内容
data.comment: Let's scroll through the items inside the rectangular outlines, using the flick gesture.

data.name: View005_Message00300_TextKey
data.value: 请将手势光标移动到框的中央。
data.comment: Move the Gesture Cursor to the center of the window.

data.name: View005_Message00400_TextKey
data.value: 请横向伸出大拇指弯曲其他四指，像拖动一样向左或右移动一点后迅速松开四指。
data.comment: Keep your thumb sticking out and curl your 4 fingers slightly, just like the drag gesture.

data.name: View005_Message00500_TextKey
data.value: 滑动操作是朝一个方向移动一点您的手并迅速松开。
data.comment: To flick, start moving your hand slightly in one direction and open it quickly.

data.name: View005_Message00600_TextKey
data.value: 不需要大幅度地移动您的手。
data.comment: There is no need to make large movements with your hand.

data.name: View005_Message00700_TextKey
data.value: 移动手并迅速放开就是滑动。
data.comment: Just keep moving your hand and open it quickly to flick.

data.name: View005_Message00800_TextKey
data.value: 滑动和拖动不同的是松开手的时机。
data.comment: The timing for opening your hand is a bit different from dragging.

data.name: View005_Message00900_TextKey
data.value: 弯曲四指并朝一个方向小小地移动，然后迅速松开手。
data.comment: Curl your fingers and while moving your hand in one direction, quickly open your hand.

data.name: View005_Message01000_TextKey
data.value: 如果像弹开一样迅速松开手的话，滑动会更漂亮。
data.comment: You can achieve a smooth flick by springing open your hands.

data.name: View005_Message02700_TextKey
data.value: 这样您已经掌握了手势的基本操作了。
data.comment: You have now learned all of the basic gestures.
